Class: table

table

Table custom web component

Constructor

new table()

Properties:
Name Type Description
title string Table title.
disabled boolean True to disabled. Dedault to true.
onafterdraw string Function name that will be executed after data generated (only work on data loaded from server/ajax or if table data is generated again with generateData function)
Source:
  • table.js, line 2
Examples

Table usage

<j-table width="300px">

	[

		[ "ID", "Fruit", "data 1", "data 2", "data 3"],

		[ 1, "apple", 4, 10, 2 ],

		[ 2, "banana", 0, 4, 0 ],

		[ 3, "grape", 2, 3, 5 ],

		[ 4, "pear", 4, 2, 8 ],

		[ 5, "strawberry", 0, 14, 0 ]

	]

</j-table>

Table with toolbar

<j-table width="300px">

	<j-toolbar position="top">

		<j-button>My Button</j-button>

	</j-toolbar>

	<j-toolbar position="bottom">

		<j-spacer></j-spacer><j-button>My Button</j-button>

	</j-toolbar>

	[

		[ "ID", "Fruit", "data 1", "data 2", "data 3"],

		[ 1, "apple", 4, 10, 2 ],

		[ 2, "banana", 0, 4, 0 ],

		[ 3, "grape", 2, 3, 5 ],

		[ 4, "pear", 4, 2, 8 ],

		[ 5, "strawberry", 0, 14, 0 ]

	]

</j-table>

Table with onafterdraw example

<script>

	function cls(e){

		console.log('Data has been drawn!');

	}

</script>

<j-table width="300px" title="Table" onafterdraw="cls">

	[

		["Fruit", "data 1", "data 2", "data 3"]

	]

	<j-loader src="data.json"></j-loader>

</j-table>

Extends

  • dataView

Events

afterdraw

Fire after data has been drawn (only work on data loaded from server/ajax or if table data is generated again with generateData function)
Parameters:
Name Type Description
event object Event object
Source:
  • table.js, line 54
Example
<j-table width="300px" title="Table" id="table1">

 	[

 		["Fruit", "data 1", "data 2", "data 3"]

 	]

 	<j-loader src="data.json"></j-loader>

 </j-table>

<script>

$('#table1').on('afterdraw', function(){

	console.log('Data in table has been draw!')

})

</script>
